DOC.brief_title: Telbivudine Therapy HBeAg-positive Pregnant Women Prevent Mother-to-infant Transmission HBV
DOC.detailed_description: Infants HBV-infected mother positive HBeAg increase risk become infect HBV . Standard immunoprophylaxis mother-to-infant transmission HBV include administration hepatitis B immunoglobulin ( HBIG ) hepatitis B vaccine ; however , approximately 5-15 % infant protect despite receive preventive measure . It report antiviral prophylaxis among HBV-infected pregnant woman reduce mother-to-infant transmission HBV . However , research need obtain definite conclusion . This study determine whether telbivudine among HBsAg- HBeAg-positive pregnant woman third trimester , addition standard immunoprophylaxis infant , effective standard immunoprophylaxis alone prevent HBV infection infant .
